config.arcgis_rest:
MapLayer1,ArcGISDynamicMapServiceLayer,http://sampleserver1.arcgisonline.com/ArcGIS/rest/services/Specialty/ESRI_StatesCitiesRivers_USA/MapServer,
v4layer1,FeatureLayer,https://services3.arcgis.com/GVgbJbqm8hXASVYi/arcgis/rest/services/Trailheads/FeatureServer/0,
v4 Trail Line,FeatureLayer,https://services3.arcgis.com/GVgbJbqm8hXASVYi/arcgis/rest/services/Trails/FeatureServer/0,
v4 Parks,FeatureLayer,https://services3.arcgis.com/GVgbJbqm8hXASVYi/arcgis/rest/services/Parks_and_Open_Space/FeatureServer/0,mapid= PARK_NAME
v4 Wurman Dots,FeatureLayer,https://services1.arcgis.com/4yjifSiIG17X0gW4/arcgis/rest/services/Landcover_30km_centroids_from_hex/FeatureServer,renderer=wurman_point_renderer
v4 3D renderer,FeatureLayer,https://services.arcgis.com/V6ZHFr6zdgNZuVG0/arcgis/rest/services/counties_politics_poverty/FeatureServer/0,renderer=arc_3d_renderer
v4 transit,FeatureLayer,http://services.arcgis.com/V6ZHFr6zdgNZuVG0/arcgis/rest/services/subway_tcl_stations_lines_wgs84/FeatureServer/0,legend=T
config.svg_renderers:
대한민국,./data/korea_2019.svg
대구:./data/korea_DAEGU_2019.svg
대전:./data/korea_DAEJEON_SIG.svg
서울:./data/korea_SEOUL_SIG.svg
세종시,./data/korea_SEJONGSI_EMD.svg
전라남도,./data/korea_JEONLANAMDO_SIG.svg
전라북도,./data/korea_JEONLABUKDO_2019.svg
